attributes.action: To ensure all national level sport coverage of home grown sports football, rugby and cricket is shown on terrestrial television. National sport for the nation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The subscription television services have taken most sports away from free TV. There’s too much money in the various leagues and cup competitions to change this anytime soon, but the people of the UK should be able to watch their national teams play as a matter of right. 
England, Scotland, Wales, and Northern Ireland should all be able to watch their own countryman doing their very best for their country. The people of the UK should be able to support their country for free – not held to ransom.

Simply, this petition is aimed at getting national level mainstream sports on terrestrial TV. So all man, woman, and children can enjoy supporting their country without paying for the pleasure.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
